resources.string: "This fast wireless charger isn't compatible with your phone, so you're charging at standard speed."
"Choose which apps can set alarms and schedule actions. Allowing apps to do this may increase battery use. If not allowed, apps may not function normally, and their alarms won't work as scheduled."
"Don amfani da wannan siffofin, kana buƙatar barin %s don bincika na'urorin da ke kusa a cikin Saituna."
Select an app to open when you press and hold the Home key. To change the selected app later, go to Device assistance app in Settings.
Select an app to open when you swipe inward from one of the bottom corners of the screen. To change the selected app later, go to Digital assistant app in Settings.

Za a aika sautin midiya kai tsaye daga wayar ku zuwa lasifikar ku. Za ku iya kunna fayilolin da aka ajiye a wayar ku, amma ba za ku iya kunnawa, dakatarwa, ko tsallake waƙoƙi ta amfani da lasifika ba.

Za a aika sautin midiya kai tsaye daga tabulet ɗin ku zuwa lasifikar ku. Za ku iya kunna fayilolin da aka ajiye akan tabulet ɗin ku, amma ba za ku iya kunna, dakatarwa, ko tsallake waƙoƙi ta amfani da lasifika ba.
Ana canzawa tsakanin caji marar waya zuwa caji mai waya

"Charging has been stopped. Your phone's temperature is too high. Be careful when disconnecting the charger. It may be very hot.
Disconnecting and reconnecting the charger may allow charging to continue normally. If overheating persists, contact Customer Service as there may be a risk of fire or injury."

"Charging has been stopped. Your tablet's temperature is too high. Be careful when disconnecting the charger. It may be very hot.
Disconnecting and reconnecting the charger may allow charging to continue normally. If overheating persists, contact Customer Service as there may be a risk of fire or injury."
"Make sure you're using a compatible charger and that it's connected to your phone correctly."
"Make sure you're using a compatible charger and that it's connected to your tablet correctly."
Your phone is too hot. Charging will continue when it cools down.
Your tablet is too hot. Charging will continue when it cools down.
Your phone is too cold. Charging will continue when it warms up.
Your tablet is too cold. Charging will continue when it warms up.
Charge your phone or tap here to turn on Power saving mode.
Charge your tablet or tap here to turn on Power saving mode.
Make sure the cable and charger are properly connected. If this happens frequently, try replacing the charging cable.
Charging will start again when the battery level drops down to %d%%.
An sayar da sa cajin don kare batir ɗinku
Learn how to protect your battery.
"For faster charging, use a supported charger and make sure it's not damaged."
Slow charging. Make sure charger is supported and not damaged.
Charging has been slowed because your phone is cold. It will change back to normal speed if the phone gets warmer.
Charging has been slowed because your tablet is cold. Charging will change back to normal speed if the tablet gets warmer.
Charging will change back to normal speed if the phone gets warmer.
Charging will change back to normal speed if the phone gets warmer.
Charging slowed due to low temperature
Wireless charging has been paused. Try removing foreign objects or thick cases that may be between the charger and your phone.
Wireless charging paused because your phone is too hot. Try again when it cools down.
Wireless charging paused because your tablet is too hot. Try again when it cools down.
Canzaɓa daga caji na waya zuwa caji marar waya
Manhajojin da ke ba da tallafi wa haskawa
Ba a shigar da manhajojin da suka dace ba
Zaɓi abin da za ku kunnawa lokacin da ku haɗa zuwa lasifikar Wi-Fi. Idan zaɓin da ku zaɓa baya samun ba da tallafi wa wannan manhajar ko lasifikar, za a yi amfani da ɗayan zaɓin a maimako.

Idan manhaja yana ba da tallafi wa haskawa, za a haska sautin midiya daga manhaja zuwa lasifikar ku. Za ku iya kunnawa, dakatarwa, da tsallake waƙoƙi ta amfani da lasifikar. Kuna iya kunna kallo midiya, amma ba fayilolin da aka ajiye a wayar ku ba. Idan manhaja ba ya ba da tallafi wa haskawa, za a yi amfani da nunin madubi a maimako.

Idan manhaja yana ba da tallafi wa haskawa, za a haska sautin mdidiya daga manhaja zuwa lasifikar ku. Za ku iya kunnawa, dakatarwa, da tsallake waƙoƙi ta amfani da lasifikar. Kuna iya kunna kallon midiya, amma ba fayilolin da aka ajiye akan tabulet ba. Idan manhaja ba ya ba da tallafi wa haskawa, za a yi amfani da nunin madubi a maimako.
"Idan na'urar da ku zaɓa baya ba da tallafi wa Auracast, watsawa na yanzu zai zo ƙarshe."

"Your device is overheating. Steps will be taken to cool it down.
You can still use your device, but: - The screen may be dimmed. - The device may slow down. - Charging may be paused.
After the device cools down, performance will return to normal automatically."

"Your tablet is getting too hot, so it's taking steps to cool itself down.
You can still use your tablet, but you may notice: The screen might dim. The tablet might slow down. Charging might pause.
After the tablet cools down, performance willAutomatically go back to normal."

"Your phone is getting hot, so it's taking steps to cool itself down.
You can still use it, but you may notice: - The screen might dim. - The phone might slow down. - Charging might pause.
Your phone will return to normal once it cools down."
Ba mu sami wata intanet ba.
Don canza mafitar sauti, %s yana buƙatar cire haɗin.
Abu da aka ajiye a wurin %d.
Abu a wurin %d ba za ku iya ja ba.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Wi-Fi tethering, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Smart View needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
Turning on portable Wi-Fi hotspot will turn off Wi-Fi.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
To use Wi-Fi tethering, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
To use Mobile Hotspot, Wi-Fi needs to be turned off.
Wi-Fi is turned off when USB tethering or Mobile Hotspot is active. To turn on Wi-Fi, please turn off USB tethering or Mobile Hotspot.
Mobile Hotspot uses your mobile data connection. Your Wi-Fi connection will be turned off.
"The current Wi-Fi network can't be shared using Mobile Hotspot. Mobile data will be used instead."
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Wi-Fi tethering, any devices currently connected through Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices currently connected using Wi-Fi Direct need to be disconnected.

The connected charger is incompatible with this phone. To prevent damage to your phone, charging has been stopped. To continue charging, use the original charger and cable that were provided with this phone.

The connected charger is incompatible with this tablet. To prevent damage to your tablet, charging has been stopped. To continue charging, use the original charger and cable that were provided with this tablet.
Unable to charge. Use the original charger.
"Kuna iya canza mafitar sauti daga majiyin kunne zuwa lasifika zuwa wayar ku, duk daga sashin mafita na Midiya. Kuna iya kunna music akan na'urorin Wi-Fi da yawa a lokaci guda."
"Kuna iya canza mafitar sauti daga majiyin kunne zuwa lasifika zuwa tabulet ɗin ku, duk daga sashin mafita na Midiaya. Kuna iya kunna music akan na'urorin Wi-Fi da yawa a lokaci guda."
Don kunna wasu sautuna, watsawa na yanzu zai katse haɗin.
Don amfani da Music Share, watsawa na yanzu zai cire haɗin.
"Don canza na'urar nafitar sauti, watsawa na yanzu zai cire haɗin."
An dakatar da sa cajin don kare batir ɗinku
An dakatar da sa cajin %d%% don kare batir ɗinku.
Ƙyale duk naúrori su yi haɗi
"Ku sa katin SIM don amfani da Hotspot na Waya da ma wasu zabuɓɓukan haɗin na'ura."
Insert a SIM card to use Wi-Fi tethering and other tethering functions.
Insert a UIM/SIM card to use Mobile Hotspot and other tethering functions.
Mobile Hotspot and Smart View cannot be turned on at the same time. Smart View will be turned off.
WLAN hotspot and Smart View cannot be enabled at the same time. Smart View will be disabled.
"Wi-Fi tethering and Smart View can't be turned on at the same time. Smart View will be turned off."
Make sure you have permission from the Wi-Fi provider before sharing your connection.
Some Wi-Fi networks may not be available while Wi-Fi sharing is on.
Turn off Airplane mode to use Mobile Hotspot.
"Your phone's Wi-Fi network will be shared if you turn on Mobile Hotspot while connected to a Wi-Fi network. Make sure you have permission from the network owner before sharing."
Mobile Hotspot shares your Wi-Fi network
Standard refresh rate can make your battery last longer.
"Ba za a iya samun na'urar da kuke nema ba?"
Kunna waƙa akan lasifikar Bluetooth na abokin ku, sitiriyo mota, ko majiyin kunne ba tare da rikitaccen tsarin haɗawa ba.
Idan kai da abokin ku duka kuna da Galaxy Buds, zaku iya sauraron music tare.
An dakatar da caji bisa tsarin barcinku. Za a sake farayin caji a %s.

"Your device overheated. It powered off to prevent damage.
Overheating can be caused by: - Using graphics-intensive apps, such as games and navigation apps, for long periods of time. - Transferring large files. - Using your device in a hot environment."
You will not be able to power on the device again until after it has cooled down.
Your device is overheating. To cool down, it will power off in %d seconds.

"Your phone got hot. It turned off to prevent damage to the phone.
This can be caused by: Using graphics-intensive apps, like video games and navigation apps, for long periods of time. Downloading or uploading large files. Using your phone in a very hot location."

"Your tablet got too hot. It turned off to prevent damage to the tablet.
Overheating can be caused by: Using graphics intensive apps like video games and navigation apps for long periods of time. Downloading or uploading large files. Using your tablet in a very hot location."
Why did my phone turn off by itself?
Why did my tablet turn off by itself?
"Your phone is getting hot. It will now turn off to cool down."
Your tablet is getting too hot. It will now turn off to cool down.
For faster charging, use the charger that came with your phone.
For faster charging, use the charger that came with your tablet.
"You've connected a USB Power Delivery charger, but your phone doesn't support USB Power Delivery, so it's charging at standard speed."
"You've connected a USB Power Delivery charger, but your tablet doesn't support USB Power Delivery, so it's charging at standard speed."
Turn on Fast charging to get the best charging speed from the connected charger.
Turn on Advanced charging to get the best charging speed from the connected charger.
Yi wasa tare da Music Share
Swipe down from the top right corner of the screen to open the quick settings panel. Swipe down from anywhere else on the top of the screen to open the notification panel.
View notifications and collapsed quick settings together. To view the full quick settings panel, swipe down one more time.
Your phone will restart and all your apps will be available again.
Your tablet will restart and all your apps will be available again.
Tap here to turn off Safe mode.
"Can't adjust brightness because it's being controlled by %s."
Ba za a iya canza saituna ba sannan Yanayin adana wuta yana kunne.
Shafa sama ko kasa tare da yatsu biyu don gurgurawa.
"Nuna na'urorin Music Share waɗanda ke nan kusa don ku iya haɗa su cikin sauri."
"Don canza na'urar mafitar sauti, watsawa na yanzu zai tsaya."
Danna %s don ci gaba da sake kunnawa
Don kunna Music Share, Smart View yana buƙatar cire shi a haɗin.
An samu wani kuskure a cikin %s. Sake gwadawa a cikin manhaja.
"A halin yanzu ana haska sauti zuwa wannan na'urar a cikin manhajar %1$s. Don sauya mafitar zuwa wannan na'urar, dakatar da haskawa a cikin %2$s da farko."
Your phone is being protected from accidental touches.
Keep the top of your phone clear to prevent this from happening.
Keep the top of your tablet clear to prevent this from happening.
Swipe up to dismiss accidental touch protection.
"Your phone is being protected from accidental touches while it's in a dark place such as a pocket or bag."
"Your tablet is being protected from accidental touches while it's in a dark place such as a pocket or bag."
Your tablet is being protected from accidental touches.
Be careful, as the cable plug may be hot.

Charging has stopped because your phone is overheating. After disconnecting, check both the cable and the charging port for anything that could be blocking the connection. You can then reconnect the cable to check if your phone charges normally. If the problem persists, visit a Samsung Customer Service location.

Charging has stopped because your tablet is overheating. After disconnecting, check both the cable and the charging port for anything that could be blocking the connection. You can then reconnect the cable to check if your tablet charges normally. If the problem persists, visit a Samsung Customer Service location.

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean and the moisture is gone.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port."

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your phone, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean and the moisture is gone.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port.
In the meantime, you can charge your phone wirelessly."

"We've detected moisture or foreign material in your charging/USB port.
Check your charging/USB port for any foreign material such as dust or debris. To prevent damage to your tablet, don't plug anything in until the charging port is clean and the moisture is gone.
To dry the port, shake out any moisture, then wait for it to dry, which could take several hours. You can speed up drying by pointing a fan or dryer (cool air only) at the port."

"Data sharing (tethering) allows you to share your data with other devices.
Pay attention to the data fee depending on the data plan that you're using."
To use Mobile Hotspot, any devices connected for sharing will be disconnected.
To use Mobile Hotspot, your Samsung DeX session needs to be disconnected.
An kasa haɗi zuwa hanyar sadarwa
Wireless charging uses more energy than wired charging.
With your phone closed, make sure the center part of the back of your phone is aligned with the center of the charger.
Ku tabbatar cewa ɓangaren cibiyar na bayan wayar da aka daidaita tare da tsakiyar caja.
